main event: On November 22, 1957, an unidentified flying object was observed in Lower California, Mexico, for about 3 minutes.
interesting points: The object was reported to be at extreme altitude and was closely observed for an additional 4 minutes., The sighting included a visual representation of a missile that was followed to its crash site inland., The course of the object was approximately 110 degrees., The final conclusions labeled the report as possibly unreliable due to inconsistencies and insufficient data., The object was described as a singular entity, with additional comments noting no missile activity was observed in the area.
sighted object: unidentified flying object similar to a missile
witness description: There were no specific witness accounts detailed in the report.
